li.label: Sucker
li.description: They say a sucker is born every minute, and NAME is that sucker.

li.label: Amateur haggler
li.description: NAME likes to haggle. HECAP gets better prices than most people.

li.label: Haggling enthusiast
li.description: NAME always gets the best deals - so much so that others often fail to realize they're being duped.

li.label: Awkward
li.description: The elephant in the room is named NAME.

li.label: Tucker
li.description: "That's a lotta graves. Lotta holes to fill. Bow-Chicka-Bow-Wow" - NAME, probably.

li.label: Melodic voice
li.description: NAME could talk for days on end and people would still listen to that sweet voice.

li.label: Uncouth
li.description: Subtle is the name of the game of diplomacy, and subtle, NAME is not.

li.label: Diplomatic
li.description: NAME knows how to grease the wheels of diplomacy.

li.label: Very diplomatic
li.description: NAME has such a way with his words and gifts that HE always manages to cool down a tense situation.

li.label: Shooting amateur
li.description: NAME has never held a gun in HIS hands. The weight of the cold metal in HIS hands makes HECAP shudder uncontrollably.

li.label: Shooting enthusiast
li.description: NAME knows HIS way with a gun.

li.label: Shooting professional
li.description: "My rifle is my best friend. It is my life. I must master it as I must master my life." - NAME, probably.
